wikipedia_page.main: Michael Joseph Patrick McGurk (born 18 September 1968) has been Archdeacon of Liverpool since 10 September 2017.McGurk trained for the ministry at  St John's College, Nottingham; and was ordained deacon in 2007, and priest in 2008. After a curacy at Haughton he was Rector of Harpurhey from 2010 until his appointment as Archdeacon.
